subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Tommy John fell 12 victories short of 300 and therefore a probable spot in the Hall of Fame, but his name will be remembered longer than that of many pitchers who are or will be in the Hall.
snippet: Tommy John fell 12 victories short of 300 and therefore a probable spot in the Hall of Fame, but his name will be remembered longer than that of many pitchers who are or will be in the Hall.
